Summary: Delicious smelling body lotion and hair treatment
text: I had been using Barleans organic coconut oil for cooking and as a body lotion and a conditioning treatment for my dry curly hair.  I decided to order the Nutiva brand because it was about half the price.  All in all I am pleased with  my purchase.  I slightly prefer the Barleans because I think it is smoother and has a fresher scent, the Nutiva smells more sweet and has a bit of a lingering smell. I have not used the Nutiva brand in cooking yet. But I love organic coconut oil and Nutiva has a great price on amazon.
